text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Wow, so much greenery… Fufu… to be able to enjoy the 
'sunny wind' in a place like this is a pleasant surprise…
I brought Zephyr too a zoo during our day off.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
… 
…sigh… It's like on a path of 'flower storm'

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Oh, trainer? Hello. Actually… I was looking for the 'sunny 
wind'. I wanted to feel the nature.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
But… 
I can't find any in a city like this. The wind feels empty.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Even so, I can feel the liveliness of the 
wind of feast. Everyone is so restless as 
if they were blown by the easterly wind.

She was fascinated by the animals, just as I thought an 
animal lover, like her, would. There are a lot of exotic 
animals here. I'm sure she will have fun.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Fufu, little Sumikko is like a west wind of spring aren't you.

I panicked and searched for Zephyr… 
I found her resting in the rest area.
choice_data_list: Do you not want to look at animals?
Do you not want to look at animals?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
? There is animal right here. 
Look, it's Shitoshito-san…

I looked at the direction she was pointing, 
and saw a little frog taking a nap.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Also over there, Shimashima-san is having 
a picnic with his family.

Zephyr is looks at the squirrels on the tree eating nuts, 
with a smile.

Neither of these creatures are commonly seen in the city, 
but I wouldn't call them exotic.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Fufu… everyone's like a neighbor in a whirlwind.

The 'nature' she was looking for, 
was probably something like this.

If I continue to spend time with her like this, I might be 
able to gain a deeper understanding of what she treasures.
(*chirp *chirp *chirp)

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Oh dear, Manmaru-san, are you playing catch and run?

Following Zephyr chasing after the flying sparrow, 
we arrived at a quiet promenade in the zoo.

Zephyr was surrounded by sparrows and starlings 
as if she was a princess in a fairy tale.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Lalal……♪ Lalal……♪

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, Orange-san is here too. 
Shall we dance together?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… I wanted to call it based on its 
feature that I think is most beautiful.

The starling's beak and legs are colored with a striking 
orange color. I agree, they look beautiful.

Wanting to get closer to the 'nature' she liked so much, I tried 
coming up with a name for the starling like she did. And—

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: 'Stylish'-san? Fufu…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
It's got that 'triumphant wind' feeling like you do. 
Gentle, like where the spring breeze rest.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Orange-san's song is like the 'East Wind of Fall'. 
It sounds like my hometown, and makes me feel nostalgic.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I never ever thought that I could feel the 'sunny wind' 
like the one in my hometown in the city.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …Nothing… it's just, I got carried away by the wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
The current that swept across… sounded like it was singing. 
It was running wildly through the trees, playing a 
never-ending melody…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: But why?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I used to think that the melody of the wind can only be heard 
when you are alone and quiet, because you can't become one 
with the wind unless your heart is calm.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: But―there it is again.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I hear it again. 
The flow of the melody, is like the blue wind of the east.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I could feel the happiness of the wind 
being able to travel unobstructed.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
…It may be that the winds that blow around you 
are all strange winds.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your time today. 
Thanks to you, I didn't get to feel the 'black south wind'.
choice_data_list: I had fun as well. Let's come again next time.
I had fun as well. Let's come again next time.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
…'Again'… 
Yeah… if the same wind blows for both of us again, then…

Her words came out vaguely. 
Maybe because it was 'natural' for her to act alone.

Even so, I hope the same wind blows again. When the time 
comes, I'm sure it will bring me even closer to her world.
